title: Dezeen Debate features "beautifully crafted" winery in Spain

text: The latest edition of our Dezeen Debate newsletter features Foster + Partners' addition to a Spanish winery. Subscribe to Dezeen Debate now. British studio Foster + Partners built a vaulted timber hall at Bodegas Faustino winery in Spain, characterised by an earthy material palette and overhanging roof. Commenters commended the expansion, with one describing it as "a beautifully crafted building" and another highlighting the "attractive glulam structure." Lotus unveils Theory 1 concept car as "design manifesto" for the futureOther stories in this week's newsletter that fired up the comments section included British automaker Lotus' Theory 1 concept car, a circular house in California designed by Donaldson + Partners and Sou Fujimoto's addition of a visitors' centre to the Maison Ruinart champagne house in France. html:
The latest edition of our Dezeen Debate newsletter features Foster + Partners' addition to a Spanish winery. Subscribe to Dezeen Debate now.

British studio Foster + Partners built a vaulted timber hall at Bodegas Faustino winery in Spain, characterised by an earthy material palette and overhanging roof.

Commenters commended the expansion, with one describing it as "a beautifully crafted building" and another highlighting the "attractive glulam structure."

Other stories in this week's newsletter that fired up the comments section included British automaker Lotus' Theory 1 concept car, a circular house in California designed by Donaldson + Partners and Sou Fujimoto's addition of a visitors' centre to the Maison Ruinart champagne house in France.

Dezeen Debate

Dezeen Debate is sent every Tuesday and features a selection of the best reader comments and most talked-about stories. Read the latest edition of Dezeen Debate or subscribe here.

You can also subscribe to our other newsletters; Dezeen Agenda is sent every Tuesday containing a selection of the most important news highlights from the week, Dezeen Daily is our daily bulletin that contains every story published in the preceding 24 hours and Dezeen In Depth is sent on the last Friday of every month and delves deeper into the major stories shaping architecture and design.

Subscribe to our newsletters

A quarterly newsletter rounding up a selection of recently launched products by designers and studios, published on Dezeen Showroom. 

We will only use your email address to send you the newsletters you have requested. We will never give your details to anyone else without your consent. You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking on the unsubscribe link at the bottom of every email, or by emailing us at [email protected].

For more details, please see our privacy notice.

Thank you!

You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the link at the bottom of every newsletter.
